text: Ticket #12847: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes when trying to upload photos. Issue started yesterday after the latest app update (version 2.3.1). User has iPhone 12 running iOS 16.4. Error occurs consistently when selecting photos from gallery. App works fine for text posts and comments. Customer has already tried restarting phone and reinstalling app with no success. Priority: High - affecting multiple users based on app store reviews.

response.greeting: Dear Customer, I apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced with our mobile app.
response.acknowledgement: I understand that you've been facing issues when trying to upload photos after the latest update.
response.assurance: Please be assured that we are actively investigating this issue and working to provide a resolution as soon as possible.

actions.action: We recommend updating to the most recent version of iOS if you haven't already.
actions.instructions: To do this, go to Settings > General > Software Update.

actions.action: If the issue persists, please provide us with additional details about the error messages you encounter.
actions.instructions: This will help our team to diagnose and resolve the issue faster.
